name: Meld
description: Meld is a mind-bending puzzle game featuring 200+ levels and a build-in editor so you can create your own and play levels made by others!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit or higher Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10.1 compatible 512 MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
